stories.text: For long-term entrepreneurs that are burned out, but do not want to exit yet, what do you do?
stories.title: Ask HN: How do entrepreneurs manage burnout?

stories.text: Today I'm deleting TikTok, which has become one of my favorite past-times. I've laughed and learned things I never knew I wanted to know. Endless hours of looking down at my phone has given me worsening posture and annoying upper back and neck pain. As much fun as it is, I need less reasons to be looking at my phone, not more. I'm also turning off notifications on Signal in an effort to be less inclined to check my phone. Reddit mobile app, you're next.
stories.title: Deleting TikTok for physical health reasons
